001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003import java.util.Collection;
004import java.util.Set;
005
006import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyManager;
007import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyTermI;
008
009public interface CvUtils {
010
011  /**
012   * Gets valid ontology term names
013   * using the constraints from the rule bean.
014   *
015   * @param cvRule controlled vocabulary validation rule
016   * @return recommended terms
017   */
018  Set<String> getValidTermNames(CvRule<?> cvRule);
019
020  /**
021   * Gets valid ontology terms
022   * using the constraints from the rule bean.
023   *
024   * @param cvRule controlled vocabulary validation rule
025   * @return a set of ontology terms (beans)
026   */
027  Set<OntologyTermI> getValidTerms(CvRule<?> cvRule);
028
029  /**
030   * Gets the set of terms (including synonyms)
031   * that satisfy all the restrictions.
032   *
033   * @param restrictions - objects that specify required ontology terms
034   * @return set of names (strings)
035   */
036  Set<String> getValidTermNames(Collection<CvRestriction> restrictions);
037
038  /**
039   * Similar to getValidTermNames method,
040   * but the term names in the result set are all in lower case.
041   *
042   * @see #getValidTermNames(Collection)
043   *
044   * @param restrictions controlled vocabulary restrictions (on type, context, ontology terms)
045   * @return set of valid ontology terms (turned into lower case)
046   */
047  Set<String> getValidTermNamesLowerCase(Collection<CvRestriction> restrictions);
048
049  /**
050   * Gets term names and synonyms using the
051   * restriction bean to filter the data.
052   * (restriction's 'NOT' property is ignored here)
053   *
054   * @param restriction a restriction (on type, context, ontology terms)
055   * @return recommended ontology terms (names)
056   */
057  Set<String> getTermNames(CvRestriction restriction);
058
059  /**
060   * Gets a restricted set of CVs
061   * (including for synonyms) that satisfy
062   * all the restrictions in the set.
063   *
064   * @param restrictions - set of beans that together define the required constraint
065   * @return set of ontology terms
066   */
067  Set<OntologyTermI> getValidTerms(Collection<CvRestriction> restrictions);
068
069  /**
070   * Gets CVs (including for synonyms) using the
071   * criteria defined by the bean
072   * ('NOT' property, if set 'true', is ignored)
073   *
074   * @param restriction restriction (on type, context, ontology terms)
075   * @return ontology terms (objects)
076   */
077  Set<OntologyTermI> getTerms(CvRestriction restriction);
078
079
080
081  OntologyManager getOntologyManager();
082
083}
